info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:51PM CDT until May 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Clinton County in south central Illinois... Southeastern Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Northeastern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scott AFB, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 448 PM, law enforcement reported at least quarter sized hail in O`Fallon, Illinois. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, Fairview Heights, Swansea, Shiloh, Highland, Troy, Mascoutah, Breese, Lebanon, New Baden, Scott AFB, Trenton, Aviston, St. Jacob, Marine, and Summerfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 21 and 24. Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 12 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
